text: Kilian Frankiny (born 26 January 1994 in Reckingen) is a Swiss cyclist, who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam . He was named in the startlist for the 2017 Vuelta a España. In May 2018, he was named in the startlist for the 2018 Giro d'Italia. ==Major results== ;2015 : 4th Overall Giro della Valle d'Aosta ;2016 : 1st 20px Overall Giro della Valle d'Aosta ::1st Stages 1 (TTT) & 4 : 3rd Overall Peace Race U23 : 7th Overall Tour de l'Ain ;2017 : 1st Stage 1 (TTT) Vuelta a España : 1st Stage 2 (TTT) Volta a Catalunya : 3rd Road race, National Road Championships ;2018 : 9th Overall Volta a la Comunitat Valenciana ::1st 20px Young rider classification ::1st Stage 3 (TTT) ;2019 : 6th Overall Tour du Haut Var : 7th Trofeo Laigueglia ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Grand Tour ! scope="col" | 2017 ! scope="col" | 2018 ! scope="col" | 2019 ! scope="col" | 2020 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A pink jersey Giro d'Italia |— |43 |— |IP |- style="text- align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A yellow jersey Tour de France |— |— |— |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A red jersey Vuelta a España |DNF |— |21 |— |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend |- ! scope="row" | — | Did not compete |- ! scope="row" | DNF | Did not finish |} ==References== == External links == * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss male cyclists Category:People from Goms District Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Kilian Frankiny
